Posts.Content: Hi have growth around ears and very sparse on top and back. Didn't mind being bald when I was going through treatment. Shaved it off because it came out. Wore scarves and hats and au natural. It doesn't feel right to carry on wearing head gear as people still think I'm ill! So now I don't wear anything (on my head) have a wig but it's so itchy. Will see if I get any growth with minoxidil if not back to the wig shop. Ali
Posts.Title: Hair not grown back after 2years

Posts.Content: Hi my hair hasn't grown back. It's been over a year since any treatment. On tamoxifen and been under a lot of stress since my diagnosis 2013. Husband problems . Started using minoxidil to see if that helps. Anyone else have the same happen to them. Ali
Posts.Title: Hair not grown back after 2years
